problem_subtitle: The headaches every Latino business owner knows...
problem_1_desc: Tired of avocados arriving bruised, peppers without the right heat, or suppliers who don't know the difference between a jalape√±o and a serrano.
problem_2_desc: The difficulty of finding fresh tomatillos, cilantro that smells 'real', or bananas at the exact point of ripeness when you need them.
problem_3_desc: Suppliers who don't understand you, don't speak your language, and don't understand the specific needs of your Latino business.
